name: Union Bankshares, Inc.
description: Union Bankshares, Inc. is a financial services company that operates primarily in the community banking sector. Founded in 1891 and headquartered in Richmond, Virginia, Union Bank specializes in providing a wide range of financial products and services to individuals, businesses, and municipalities across its operational footprint. The bank offers personal banking services including checking and savings accounts, mortgages, and personal loans, as well as commercial banking solutions such as business checking, loans, and treasury management. As a community-focused institution, Union Bank is committed to supporting local economies and fostering strong relationships with its customers. The company has a tradition of community involvement and philanthropy, actively participating in local initiatives and programs. In addition to traditional banking services, Union Bankshares, Inc. offers wealth management and investment services, catering to clients looking for financial planning and investment advice. With a focus on innovation, the bank is also incorporating digital banking technologies to enhance customer experience and streamline operations. Union Bank continues to grow and adapt in the evolving financial landscape, ensuring it meets the needs of its diverse clientele while adhering to its core values of integrity, customer service, and community commitment.

seo.meta_title: Union Bankshares, Inc. | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Union Bankshares, Inc., a community banking institution dedicated to providing personalized financial services and supporting local economies. Learn about our banking solutions and commitment to customer service.

faq.question: What services does Union Bank offer?
faq.answer: Union Bank offers personal banking, commercial banking, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Where is Union Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Union Bank is headquartered in Richmond, Virginia, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Union Bank?
faq.answer: John Doe is the CEO of Union Bankshares, Inc.
